LanguageData.Make_Kibble.label: make kibble
LanguageData.Make_Kibble.description: Make animal kibble by combining raw meat and plants.
LanguageData.Make_Pemmican.label: make pemmican
LanguageData.Make_Pemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a long time without refrigeration.
LanguageData.Make_PemmicanCampfire.label: make pemmican
LanguageData.Make_PemmicanCampfire.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a long time without refrigeration.
